intro: Join Willi the elf on an adventure through Finland to collect the 9 pieces of a shooting star and save Christmas.
description:
Christmas Vacation
Join Willi the elf on a charming adventure through Finland, where he'll use his magic watch to collect the 9 pieces of a shooting star and save Christmas alongside Santa and his friends.

Features:

Adorable protagonist: Willi, Santa's elf helper.

Interactive story full of magic, friendship, and teamwork.

Easy reading with cheerful music and immersive sound effects.

Learn about Finland's most iconic landmarks.

Perfect for children who enjoy educational Christmas adventures.
